about_the_game:
Anders: The Dark Coast is a gripping third-person action-adventure game set to release in 2024. Players step into the shoes of Anders, the protagonist drawn into a sinister underworld after a volatile encounter with a group of dangerous criminals. As Anders delves deeper, he discovers that these felons are far more malevolent than he initially thought. Joined by his friends, Anders traverses the rugged wilderness of Australia, unraveling the mysteries of the menacing gang he stumbled upon. The plot thickens as the quest to confront Jayden, the elusive gang leader, turns deeply personal for Anders, connecting disturbingly to his own origins.


NOTE: Some levels have bright lights and sensitive lighting. Play with caution if your sensitive to bright lights and loud sounds.
